title: Romance Authors Riled by 'From Meet-Bot to AI-Do' Writing Workshop
description: A chapter of the Romance Writers of America organization planned a program called “From Meet-Bot to AI-Do: Crafting Romances in the Realm of AI," but it's since been scrubbed from the site after backlash from authors.

title: Behind the Blog: VICE’s Legacy and the Idea That ‘The Internet Is Forever’
description: This is Behind the Blog, where we share our behind-the-scenes thoughts about how a few of our top stories of the week came together. This week, we reflect on VICE's legacy, archiving, and whether the internet is really forever.

title: Our Third FOIA Forum! 3/6, 2PM EST
description: We are hosting our third FOIA Forum at the start of March. Join the livestream, file FOIAs with us, get tips, and more.
